name: SPCAFAnalysisTaskAzureDevOps
friendlyName: SPCAF Code Analysis for SharePoint and Office 365
description: Essential tool to ensure SharePoint code quality. SPCAF analyzes SharePoint code from .wsp and .app files and checks all contained code incl. XML for correctness, best practices etc.
author: Rencore

inputs.name: spcafinputdirectory
inputs.label: Input directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative or absolute path to the folder with the analyzable files (e.g. to the drop location).

inputs.name: spcafoutputdirectory
inputs.label: Output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative or absolute path to the folder where the result reports should be written to. Relative path is appended to the drop location.

inputs.name: spcaflicense
inputs.label: License File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative or absolute path to the license key file (.lic). If empty only summary reports are created. Relative path is appended to the sources directory.

inputs.name: spcafsetting
inputs.label: Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative or absolute path in source directory to the settings file. Relative path is appended to the sources directory.

inputs.name: spcafreportHTML
inputs.label: HTML
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a HTML report is created as result of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcafreportDOCX
inputs.label: DOCX
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a DOCX report is created as result of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcafreportPDF
inputs.label: PDF
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a PDF report is created as result of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcafreportCSV
inputs.label: CSV
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a CSV report is created as result of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcafreportXML
inputs.label: XML
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a XML report is created as result of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcafreportDGML
inputs.label: Dependency Diagram
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a Visual Studio DGML Diagram is created as result of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcaflogfile
inputs.label: Log File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative or absolute path in source directory to the log file.

inputs.name: spcafoutputfile
inputs.label: Output filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the output files. The name is used as a prefix for all generated reports.

inputs.name: spcafverbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Level for verbosity to limit the detail level for log messages. Valid values are: quiet, minimal, normal, Default.

inputs.name: spcaftempfolder
inputs.label: Temp Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative or absolute path in source directory to the temp folder.

inputs.name: spcafskipprojectcreation
inputs.label: Skip Project Creation
inputs.helpMarkDown: If TRUE no project (.spcaf) file is created as output of the analysis.

inputs.name: spcaftimeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional seconds after the analysis should be cancelled automatically.

inputs.name: spcaffilters
inputs.label: Filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of extensions to filter the input files, e.g. '*.wsp;*.app;*.sppkg'.

inputs.name: spcafrecurse
inputs.label: Recurse
inputs.helpMarkDown: If TRUE input directory are recursively scanned for analyzable files, if FALSE only the given root will be scanned.

inputs.name: spcaftreatErrorsAsWarnings
inputs.label: Treat Errors as Warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: If TRUE identified errors are reported as warnings.

inputs.name: spcafcustomrules
inputs.label: Custom Rules Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to custom SPCAF rule assemblies.

instanceNameFormat: SPCAF code analysis of SharePoint and Office projects for Azure DevOps
